articles.title: Is it okay to give away unwanted presents? The dos and don'ts of regifting to avoid embarrassing yourself - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Regifting can be a great way to recycle or find better use for gifts that may not have hit the mark but how you do it makes all the difference. Here are some guidelines to regift in a manner that’s tasteful and considerate.
articles.content:
1. Dont regift in the same social circle
Its a no-no to regift an item to someone in the same friend group or family as the person who gave the gift to you as it can potentially create an awkward si… [+1271 chars]
